title: Hoembpn E27 Lamp Holder Socket Light UK Plug LED Bulb Holder with Switch,360° Plug in Wall Light Lamp Base Extension Adapter Table Lamp Fittings for Bedroom Cupboard hallway Garage (2 Pack)

description: Features: The E27 plug in light bulb socket with on/off control is safe and convenient to use right out of the box. 360-degree adjustable and flexible neck. You can adjust the lighting angle according to your needs. E27 plug-in design, no wiring, plug and play, safe and convenient. The E27 lamp bulb holder has a gooseneck flexible tube, which ensures easy angle adjustment while maintaining stability and avoiding shaking. The E27 plug-in luminaire can be used to beautify any room. Perfect for home, office. lamp holder screw fitting E27 socket for durability and safety for long-term use. The E27 lampholder wall lights plug in socket is suitable for plug lamps, bed lamps, reading lights, wall lamps, work lights, etc. Suitable for LED, halogen, CFL incandescent lamps.
